actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-298.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2606, a bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to extend the authorization of appropriations contained in such Act.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2606 (Toxic substances control funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2606, a bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to extend the authorization of appropriations contained in such Act.
